translation:
My good friend and Lord

Not being able to withdraw from the market price any item belonging to the seizure, an order goes to Your Lordship Inácio for the 40$rs. of the subscriptions, and send to

Your sincere and grateful friend Almeida Piratini, November 9, 1838.

Illustrious Sir Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães. Your Fazenda in Salso. Letters from the Excellent Domingos José de Almeida dated November 7 and 9, received on the 18th of the same month and answered on the 28th of the said month.
